text: Jesús Vaquero Crespo (1950 - 17 April 2020) was a Spanish neurosurgeon. He was a known person on the treatment of medullary injuries. He was born in Madrid. He became chief of Neurosurgery of the Hospital Puerta de Hierro in 1992. He was a professor of the Autonomous University of Madrid (UAM). Vaquero died on 17 April 2020 due to COVID-19 in Madrid, aged 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Madrid Category:Spanish physicians Category:People from Madrid Category:Neurosurgeons
title: Jesús Vaquero
